mapper.select: SELECT c.lowest AS lowest, c.highest AS highest, c.open_time AS open_time, c.close_time AS close_time, c.total AS total, c1.amount AS 'open', c2.amount AS 'close' FROM ( SELECT MIN(amount) AS lowest, MAX(amount) AS highest, MIN(`timestamp`) AS open_time, MAX(`timestamp`) AS close_time, SUM(total) AS total, FLOOR(`timestamp`/#{second}) AS gb FROM dapp_currency_market WHERE currency_pair = #{currencyPair} GROUP BY gb ORDER BY gb DESC LIMIT 0, 1000 ) c INNER JOIN dapp_currency_market c1 ON c.open_time = c1.`timestamp` INNER JOIN dapp_currency_market c2 ON c.close_time = c2.`timestamp` WHERE c1.currency_pair = #{currencyPair} AND c2.currency_pair = #{currencyPair} GROUP BY c.gb ORDER BY c.open_time ASC
